Item1.Contents: Our paper titled "HPVM: Heterogeneous Parallel Virtual Machine" has been accepted for publication at PPoPP 2018!

Item2.Contents: Matt received the 2018 David J. Kuck Outstanding Ph.D. Thesis Award!

Item3.Contents: Sarita was invited to join DARPA's Information Science and Technology Study Group (ISAT) for a three year appointment!

Item4.Contents: Our paper titled "HeteroSync: A Benchmark Suite for Fine-Grained Synchronization on Tightly Coupled GPUs" has been accepted for publication at IISWC 2017!

Item5.Contents: Sarita and Matt invited to the Dagstuhl Seminar on New Challenges in Parallelism

Item7.Contents: Congratulations to Lin Cheng for depositing his M.S. thesis!

Item8.Contents: Gio passed the PhD qualifying exam!

Item9.Contents: Matt was invited to The 50 Years of ACM Turing Award Celebration!

Item11.Contents: Radha was invited to the SNF International Exploratory Workshop on Theory and Practice for Error-Efficient Computing Systems!

Item12.Contents: Matt was invited to The 50 Years of ACM Turing Award Celebration!

Item13.Contents: Our paper titled "Chasing Away RAts: Semantics and Evaluation for Relaxed Atomics on Heterogeneous Systems" has been accepted for publication at ISCA 2017!

Item14.Contents: Our paper titled "Leveraging Software Testing to Explore Input Dependence for Approximate Computing" has been accepted for publication at WAX 2017

Item15.Contents: John received the Rambus Computer Engineering Fellowship for 2017-2018!

Item16.Contents: Sarita gave a keynote speech at HiPEAC 2017 in Stockholm. Watch the full keynote here!

Item17.Contents: Huzaifa was recognized as an Outstanding Teaching Assistant for the Spring 2016 semester!
